name: hyperion-graph
description: A wrapper for node-neo4j for keeping a history of graph changes.

scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node --captureExceptions test/ && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Manuel Alabor <manuel@alabor.me>
